description: NITORI App for Android versions 6.0.4 and earlier and NITORI App for iOS versions 6.0.2 and earlier allow remote attackers to lead a user to access an arbitrary website via the vulnerable App. As a result, the user may become a victim of a phishing attack.

product.name: NITORI App for Android and NITORI App for iOS

enisaIdProduct.product_version: NITORI App for Android versions 6.0.4 and earlier and NITORI App for iOS versions 6.0.2 and earlier
